name: European Chemical Society
goal:
EuChemS aisbl – European Chemical Society - is a non-profit making association. Its mission is to promote cooperation in Europe in the field of chemistry, education and policy related issues amongst those whose interests include chemical science and education.
Its predecessor was founded in 1970. EuChemS has over 40 member societies in more than 30 countries, together representing about 160,000 chemical scientists.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Youth
euInitiatives: Circular Economy, ERA, Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe, Solar Energy, Antimicrobial Resistance, Chemicals safety, Food Sfatey, Open Science, Endocrine Disruptors
